pages.text: $(marked)Owls$() are usually active during the night, and usually spawn in $(marked)forests$() and $(marked)taigas$(). They drop $(item)Feathers$(), like any bird.

As a possible $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)$(marked)familiar$(), Owls will increase their friend's capability of flight, namely making $(l:bewitchment:tools/brooms)$(item)Brooms$() cost no ME.$(br2)They also won't take $(o)any$() fall damage, in case they somehow fall.
Owls can be tamed with $(item)Raw Rabbit$(), and bred with $(item)Raw Chicken$().
